sidebar_introduction: Hi, I'm Joel, I'm very passionate about computer science, electronics and engineering and I decided to build this website to display some projects that I've worked on throughout my life.
sidebar_under_construction: Please keep in mind that this website is under construction; I have yet to add some of my old projects and continue to improve your experience :)
sidebar_image_credit: Photo of me by Gilles Lecam
sidebar_thanks: I'd like to thank my family, friends and partner for having supported throughout my journey, as well as my professors, mentors and the people who've written the books, guides and tutorials that I have used as learning materials.
